name: Hadal Depth
description:
A turn based card game in which you embark on one of the deepest descents into the hadalpelagic trenches.

Gain more energy, as you dive further into the depths. Beware of hostile creatures. Some of them might damage your ship. As soon as they cause a breach, try to repair it with a "Welding" Card.

After each turn all cards on your hand will vanish, so try to make the most of each round. At the beginning of each turn you will regain only 1 energy, so try to manage your energy between turns. You can also regain energy by playing certain cards and selecting your ship.
